name: dynamic_notification
description: This table stores dynamic notifications related to job executions and their associated data.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the job associated with the notification.

columns.name: data
columns.description: The content or payload of the notification.

columns.name: run_date
columns.description: The date when the job was executed.

columns.name: query
columns.description: The SQL query associated with the notification.

columns.name: registry_postgres_table
columns.description: The name of the PostgreSQL table registered for the notification.

columns.name: key_template
columns.description: The template used for generating keys in the notification.

columns.name: value_template
columns.description: The template used for generating values in the notification.

columns.name: run_timestamp
columns.description: The exact timestamp when the job was executed.
